title: _NDIS_PM_PROTOCOL_OFFLOAD_TYPE (ntddndis.h)
description: The NDIS_PM_PROTOCOL_OFFLOAD_TYPE enumeration identifies the type of a protocol offload for NDIS network adapter power management.
